New Records: Dhananjaya de Silva scored 66 runs for Sri Lanka in this match.
Wanindu Hasaranga was named Player of the Match for his contributions with the ball
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by 6 wickets with 9 balls remaining
Key moments included the fall of wickets at crucial points and significant partnerships in both innings
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan elected to bat first in the match
The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Brisbane Cricket Ground, known as Woolloongabba
The match was the 32nd match of the group stage in the tournament
